SEARCH
Package model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
model.Game
public class Game extends Object
Represents the overall game state for Crazy Eights. Stores players, deck, top card, and whose turn it is. Used on both server and client side.

  • Constructor Summary

  • Constructor Details

    • Game

      public Game()
      No-args constructor (used by clients during SYNC/START). Initializes an empty player list and fallback top card.

    • Game

      public Game(List<String> playerNames)
      Main game constructor (used by host/server). Creates and deals cards to players and sets the starting discard pile.
      Parameters:
      playerNames - list of player names in joining order

  • Method Details

    • getPlayer

      public Player getPlayer(String name)
      Gets a player by name. Used when syncing or applying a move.
      Parameters:
      name - player name
      Returns:
      the matching Player object, or null if not found

    • nextTurn

      public void nextTurn()
      Advances to the next player in turn order. Wraps around to the beginning when needed.

    • getCurrentTurnIndex

      public int getCurrentTurnIndex()
      Returns the index of the current player's turn.
      Returns:
      index between 0 and players.size() - 1
